mapper.sql:
select * from review natural join member natural join PRD_DETAIL
qna_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
qna_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
member_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_no, review_writedate, review_title, review_content, review_score, review_file1, review_modifydate, mem_no, prd_d_no,review_hit) values (review_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{review_score}, #{review_file1}, sysdate, #{mem_no} ,#{prd_d_no},0)
mapper.update: /* qnaHit */ update review set review_hit = review_hit +1 where review_no = #{review_no}
